message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000. Let me know if that works for you!
Hi Alice,  $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8,000. Let me know if that works for you.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
